title: Wrong result on Dropout layer
body:
```
import torchvision.models as models
from torchsummary import summary

mobilenet = models.mobilenet_v2()
summary(mobilenet, (3, 224, 224))
```
On running this code, I got an error in the output shape of the Dropout layer. Here are the last few lines from the output :

> InvertedResidual-153            [-1, 320, 7, 7]               0
          Conv2d-154           [-1, 1280, 7, 7]         409,600
     BatchNorm2d-155           [-1, 1280, 7, 7]           2,560
           ReLU6-156           [-1, 1280, 7, 7]               0
         Dropout-157                 [-1, 1280]               0
          Linear-158                 [-1, 1000]       1,281,000
===============================================================
Total params: 3,504,872
Trainable params: 3,504,872
Non-trainable params: 0
----------------------------------------------------------------

The result for the Dropout layer is wrong because Dropout does not change the shape of the input as per the PyTorch [docs](https://pytorch.org/docs/stable/_modules/torch/nn/modules/dropout.html).
